allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Remove 72 duplicate files to reduce repository size

Removed duplicate files ending in "1" suffix that were identical copies
of their original versions. All files verified as true duplicates via
MD5 hash comparison - no newer versions were deleted.

- 29 .mat data files \(including 1.6 MB RawData1.mat\)
- 9 .dll library duplicates
- 10 .ecp configuration duplicates
- 5 .fig GUI backup files
- 19 documentation/text duplicates

Total space reclaimed: 14 MB

Verified by analyze_versions.m script which confirmed all files were
byte-for-byte identical with same timestamps.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
